page.title: 09W. Buckfastleigh Recreation
page.content:
There is a Women's Circle in the village hall at Combe, and a Women's Institute at Scorriton. An annual flower show is put on, and a Christmas party. For the younger generation there is a Youth Club which meets at Scorriton Methodist Chapel, and discos are organized from time to time. Some of the younger inhabitants also belong to the Buckfastleigh Scouts, or to the Young Farmers' Club which is based in Newton Abbot.
The village of Scorriton is twinned with Fontaine-Henry in France, and visits are arranged each year in one direction or the other. A party of about 24 visitors from Fontaine-Henry is expected in August 1985.
